mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT e.etId) AS count, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H:%i:%S') AS date FROM enters AS e INNER JOIN device AS d ON d.dId = e.edId WHERE (e.eDate >= #{date} - INTERVAL 60 SECOND) AND d.daId = #{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW())

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT e.tId) FROM enter AS e WHERE dWorker = 0 and e.aId =#{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) AS ticketing, ( SELECT COUNT(eId) FROM enter AS e WHERE dWorker = 1 and e.aId =#{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) AS staff, ( SELECT COUNT(e.eId) from (SELECT eid,tIdentitycard FROM enter AS e WHERE e.aId =#{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) group by e.eId) as e WHERE (ISNULL (e.tIdentitycard) OR LENGTH(e.tIdentitycard) < 1 ) ) AS Norealname, ( SELECT COUNT(e.eId) from (SELECT eid,tIdentitycard FROM enter AS e WHERE e.aId =#{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) group by e.eId) as e WHERE NOT(ISNULL (e.tIdentitycard) OR LENGTH(e.tIdentitycard) < 1 ) ) AS realname

SELECT count(ids) as value, DATE_FORMAT( concat( date( c.Dates ), ' ', HOUR ( c.Dates ), ':', floor( MINUTE (c.Dates ) / 10 ) * 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS time FROM ( SELECT date_format(e.eDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as Dates, e.eName as Names,e.eId as ids FROM enter as e WHERE e.aId =#{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) as c GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ORDER BY time;

SELECT count(DISTINCT ids) as value, DATE_FORMAT( concat( date( c.Dates ), ' ', HOUR ( c.Dates ), ':', floor( MINUTE (c.Dates ) / 10 ) * 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS time FROM ( SELECT date_format(t.teDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as Dates,t.teId as ids FROM tloe AS t WHERE t.teaId = #{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(t.teDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) as c GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ORDER BY time;

SELECT COALESCE(o.value,0) FROM ( SELECT count(ids) as value, DATE_FORMAT( concat( date( c.Dates ), ' ', HOUR ( c.Dates ), ':', floor( MINUTE (c.Dates ) / 10 ) * 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS time FROM ( SELECT date_format(e.eDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as Dates, e.eName as Names,e.eId as ids FROM enter as e WHERE e.aId =#{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) as c GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ),ids ORDER BY time) as e LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT count(DISTINCT ids) as value, DATE_FORMAT( concat( date( c.Dates ), ' ', HOUR ( c.Dates ), ':', floor( MINUTE (c.Dates ) / 10 ) * 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS time FROM ( SELECT date_format(t.teDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as Dates,t.teId as ids FROM tloe AS t WHERE t.teaId = #{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(t.teDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) as c GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ),ids ORDER BY time) as o on e.time=o.time

SELECT COALESCE(e.value,0) FROM ( SELECT count(ids) as value, DATE_FORMAT( concat( date( c.Dates ), ' ', HOUR ( c.Dates ), ':', floor( MINUTE (c.Dates ) / 10 ) * 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS time FROM ( SELECT date_format(e.eDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as Dates, e.eName as Names,e.eId as ids FROM enter as e WHERE e.aId =#{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) as c GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ),ids ORDER BY time) as e LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT count(DISTINCT ids) as value, DATE_FORMAT( concat( date( c.Dates ), ' ', HOUR ( c.Dates ), ':', floor( MINUTE (c.Dates ) / 10 ) * 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS time FROM ( SELECT date_format(t.teDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as Dates,t.teId as ids FROM tloe AS t WHERE t.teaId = #{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(t.teDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) as c GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ),ids ORDER BY time) as o on e.time=o.time

SELECT e.time FROM ( SELECT count(ids) as value, DATE_FORMAT( concat( date( c.Dates ), ' ', HOUR ( c.Dates ), ':', floor( MINUTE (c.Dates ) / 10 ) * 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS time FROM ( SELECT date_format(e.eDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as Dates, e.eName as Names,e.eId as ids FROM enter as e WHERE e.aId =#{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) as c GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ),ids ORDER BY time) as e LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT count(DISTINCT ids) as value, DATE_FORMAT( concat( date( c.Dates ), ' ', HOUR ( c.Dates ), ':', floor( MINUTE (c.Dates ) / 10 ) * 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS time FROM ( SELECT date_format(t.teDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as Dates,t.teId as ids FROM tloe AS t WHERE t.teaId = #{vaId} AND TO_DAYS(t.teDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ) as c GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ),ids ORDER BY time) as o on e.time=o.time

SELECT t.tSeatingarea AS 'name',count(t.tSeatingarea) as value FROM enter AS e LEFT OUTER JOIN ticketing AS t ON e.tId=t.tId WHERE e.aId = #{vaId} and TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) GROUP BY t.tSeatingarea
